name: The Star's Arena
description:
You have been summoned to the star's arena. you will suffer immense pain when the black hole touches you. if you successfully dodge the black hole a hundred times you will return back to your neighborhood. 

instructions(read instructions before playing):

WASD/arrow keys to move 

dodge the black hole to get 10 points

if the black hole touches you you loses 30 points and your dead version become a barrier.

get 1000 points to win
